citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm - 1
pm on 07-Aug-19.
During that time, the inspector waited at the facility and knocked on doors of the owner's house.
